April 17, 1949 D Queensland State Brass Band Championship (A Grade)
Queensland State Brass Band Championship (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Queensland State Brass Band Championship queensland-state-brass-band-championship-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
Ipswich, Queensland, Australia NEW RULE - This is the first contest in which the new rule to a championship band operated .The champion shield now goes to the band gaining the greatest number of points in music & drill -instead of the band winning the aggregate in selections only (Cairns newspaper 14/4/1949)
Marching events - - Street / Oval / Diagram points listed under Stage March
Sept. 18, 2018, 11:15 p.m. July 12, 2020, 1:59 p.m.
